results.title: Phiguring out acids and bases
results.creator_credit: Shane Mulcahy, Trish Pilley, Glen Foster, Deborah Lawther and Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education
results.brief_description: Examines the acids and bases in everyday use and develops the idea of ph measurment both quantitatively and qualitatively as a measure of concentration.This program presents historical developments of the proton/theory and pH notation. Practical applications of pH testing and adjustments are also covered.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Shane Mulcahy, Trish Pilley, Glen Foster, Deborah Lawther and Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education

results.title: Phenomena
results.brief_description: Creepy thriller from horror maestro Dario Argento features a strong performance from a very young Jennifer Connelly as an imperilled schoolgirl (also named Jennifer) who undergoes a series of frightening encounters whilst boarding at a Swiss finishing school. After experiencing nightmares that provide insight into a serial killer’s movements, Jennifer’s talent for communicating with insects links her to bug specialist Dr McGregor, with whom she aims to unmask the murderer. Engaging in the tropes of the genre - and using his trademark gore and gross-out aesthetics - Argento provides an array of thrills, scares and narrative twists all backed by a rock soundtrack. Uncut, uncensored widescreen edition. Also known as “Creepers” (US title).

results.title: Magic lantern projector with curtain
results.brief_description: An unusual early 20th Century magic lantern of wood and brass construction with tinplate lamp house and a rear curtain. It is of unusual configuration - possibly for scientific use - having twin objectives (one behind the other) and bearing a maker’s plate for Reynolds and Branson of Leeds who were well known for their science lanterns. The detachable front objective has a focal length of 14” and bears the trademark for John Wrench of London. There would appear to be multiple options for image adjustment, with the lamp housing and lens assembly capable of sliding backwards and forwards, and rack and pinion arrangement allowing fine adjustment for the objective lenses. Overall length 59cm (excluding rear curtain) and 27cm high.

results.title: Peter Pan (Disney) [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Wilfred Jackson, Clyde Geronimi, Hamilton Luske, Walt Disney and Walt Disney Pictures
results.brief_description: Disney’s well-loved version of the Sir James M. Barrie play. The Darling children are taken on a series of wonderful adventures to Never-never Land. Their guide is the daring and magical Peter Pan who refuses to ever grow up. Along with Peter and his gang of Lost Boys, assisted by the beautiful fairy Tinkerbell, the Darling children do battle against the wicked Captain Hook to save Never-never Land from his evil plans. Beautifully animated and featuring the voices of Bobby Driscoll and Kathryn Beaumont.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Wilfred Jackson, Clyde Geronimi, Hamilton Luske, Walt Disney and Walt Disney Pictures

results.title: Peter Pan
results.brief_description: Wendy Darling awakes one night to discover Peter Pan searching for his shadow. She helps him to find it, sews it back on and in return Peter and fairy, Tinker Bell teach the children to fly.

results.title: Pesticides: friend or foe?
results.creator_credit: Ron Saunders, Bruce Moir and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Shows the need for great care in the preparation and use of pesticides. A home gardener and a farmer each make many mistakes when spraying. Shows the mistakes, the dangerous results and the correct procedures.
